2095690.name: REVO Soundtrack
2095690.description:
This is the original game soundtrack for REVO, a neon shoot ‘em up developed by Cosmic Misfit Studio and released for PC in August 2021. All songs on this album were composed and produced by the game’s solo developer Drew Van Camp from 2015 through 2018 and are featured in the game.

REVO’s synthwave soundtrack is composed of electronic textures, pulsating beats, and synthesized soundwaves. Enjoy modern production with a refreshingly retrofuturistic taste as you battle through a sinister space storm of music.
